sentences.english: Traders in pet markets in Shenyang experienced the same conditions as Chen.
sentences.chinese: 和陳琦一樣無奈的還有瀋陽市寵物市場的攤主們。

sentences.english: Just capable the incitement of Feng feather and Long Qi once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，剛纔經歷了鳳羽和龍琦的刺激。

sentences.english: Rosie really knows how to belt out a song.
sentences.chinese: 羅琦的確懂得如何聲情並茂地演唱一首歌曲。

sentences.english: This paper takes "Chi Chun Correspondence Collection" as the main research scope.
sentences.chinese: 本論文便是以《琦君書信集》爲主要研究範圍。

sentences.english: Rosie's weight puts on 5 kilos since she quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 羅琦自戒菸以來體重增加了5公斤。
